casebody.data:
Robert J. RECKLEIN and Curtis B. Recklin, Appellants,
v.
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON TRUST COMPANY, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION FKA The Bank of New York Trust Company, N.A., as Successor to JP Morgan Chase Bank, N.A. as Trustee for RAMP 2004RS2; Wachovia Bank, National Association; and The Orchards Community Association, Inc., Appellees. Case No. 2D18-947 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed February 1, 2019

Affirmed.
